title: The First Letter: Borrowed Pen Confession
content:
Plain white printer paper, yet it held magic. On the back, a hand-drawn heart pierced by an arrow with 'Talha' carefully centered. The message read:

"Dear Talha,
I love you. You are the coolest man on campus. You are loved.
Love, your secret admirer ðŸ’˜ðŸ’˜ðŸ’˜"

Forensic note: Written with Person X's black Parker Jotter (bench neighbor's pen). Clever girl - you left no traces but borrowed from my ecosystem.
